name: Hamburger Soup with Macaroni
author: kenlynkaye
summary: This hamburger soup with macaroni feeds a crowd of people. Serve with Parmesan cheese, a salad, and warm crusty bread for a great meal. Make it ahead for even better flavor.
ingredients: 6 medium carrots, cut into bite-sized pieces
1 teaspoon chili powder, or more to taste
directions: Heat a large soup pot over medium-high heat
Cook and stir ground beef and onion in the hot skillet until beef is browned and crumbly and onion is translucent, 5 to 7 minutes
Add diced tomatoes, beef broth, water, carrots, celery, parsley, bay leaf, salt, chili powder, and thyme
Bring to a simmer and cook for 3 to 4 hours
Add macaroni and cook, stirring occasionally, until tender yet firm to the bite, 8 to 10 minutes
